# Day 1
Install Ruby: go for the current version. There are many parsers available, just let them be.
```
sudo dnf install ruby
sudo dnf install rubygem-irb
```
First command installed 11 packages, second command was needed for provsioning Interactive RuBy used in the book. This added one package (12 packages in total).

Everything within Ruby is an Object down to each individual number. 
Typing 4.methods returns the methods that 4 can take.
